MSG_UNALLOWED_VISIT: Unallowed to visit the game room.
MSG_PLAYER_DUPLICATED: You've been in the game room already.
MSG_WAITING_COMPETITOR: Waiting for the competitor, and you can switch the number zone right now...
MSG_IS_MY_TURN_1: It's your turn right now, and the game will give you a random card (for attack / defense).
